::DrillBit::

DrillBit woke up in the CR tank, he was in beast mode. The combination
of the CR fluid, and the internal repairs, got him fixed up fast. He
climbed out of the tank.
"DrillBit, terrorize." He transformed, to bot mode. He spoted KitKat,
next to the tank. He carefuly picked her up, and placed her into the
tank.
"Get well." he said, more to himself, then her. He stayed waiting for
her to awake.
